title: [GAMEPLAY] Dark Star Thresh's Dark Passage attaching lantern light to other champions
body:
The bug I encountered appears to be graphical more than anything but I was not able to test it entirely.

When another champion uses a Dark Star Thresh's Dark Passage to move to Thresh, the lantern light from the default Thresh skin gets attached to the champion that used the lantern. The light goes away when the ability timer runs out. However I was not able to test if the light would give other champions a shield. 

To reproduce, play Dark Star Thresh and have another champion use Thresh's Dark Passage to move to Thresh. 

I do know that this bug affects Victor as it happened every time he used my lantern, but Victor was the only one on my team to use it.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We can check it out and see what's going on. If we have any other questions about it, we'll hit you up on this post. :)
